text:
jmeter.reportgenerator.exporter.html.series_filter is a regexp
jmeter.reportgenerator.sample_filter is not. 
A regexp is more flexible and to be uniform it's better to choose one policy, ie REGULAR Expression
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
